question: [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/oracle/oracle_attest_action.move] [Function: run()] [Object Liveness] If oracle, queue, or guardian objects are deleted/wrapped between validation and actuation, can this cause undefined behavior? (High)
